pull.title: add witness address to address book
pull.body:
Currently any received funds for these addresses are counted as change, resulting in odd behavior in calls like listtransactions where it won't list them. 

If `account` support is desired I can include this but I don't think it necessary for what this does.

events.message: add witness address to address book

events.body: ~~This conflicts with #8699 which nukes this RPC call completely.~~
@laanwj This one is `addwitnessaddress` the other one is `createwitnessaddress`?
This is backported in #8772, removing tag
